title: Awesome List Updates on Nov 13, 2021
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on Nov 13, 2021 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Yew
items.content_text:
### Crates / Component Libraries

*   [yew-mdc (⭐62)](https://github.com/dungeonfog/yew-mdc) - Material Design Components for the Yew framework.
items.content_html:
Crates / Component Libraries

  • yew-mdc (⭐62) - Material Design Components for the Yew framework.

items.title: Awesome Mqtt
items.content_text:
### Broker

*   [NanoMQ (⭐2k)](https://github.com/nanomq/nanomq) - A light-weight and Blazing-fast MQTT Broker for IoT Edge platform.

### Clients

*   [mqtt\_monitor (⭐9)](https://github.com/filipsPL/mqtt-monitor) - simple and lightweight console moniotor for mqtt topics, with eye-candies, in python 3.

### Smart Home Hardware Interfaces / Firmwares for ESP based Devices

*   [can2mqtt (⭐92)](https://github.com/c3re/can2mqtt) - CAN-Bus - MQTT Bridge (also works vice versa).
*   [gardena2mqtt (⭐12)](https://github.com/Domochip/gardena2mqtt) - Docker Gateway to control GARDENA Smart system devices (Sileno mower, Irrigation Control, etc.) through MQTT.
*   [zwavejs2mqtt (⭐1.1k)](https://github.com/zwave-js/zwavejs2mqtt) - Zwave to Mqtt gateway and Control Panel Web UI.

### Misc / Firmwares for ESP based Devices

*   [serial2mqtt (⭐139)](https://github.com/vortex314/serial2mqtt) - A Linux gateway to connect low-cost microcontrollers only with a serial port to MQTT.

### Visualization, Dashboards / Firmwares for ESP based Devices

*   [MYHELLOIOT](https://adrianromero.github.io/myhelloiot/) - MYHELLOIOT is a MQTT dashboard application inspired in my other MQTT project HelloIoT.
*   [PlotJuggler (⭐5.2k)](https://github.com/facontidavide/PlotJuggler) - PlotJuggler is a tool to visualize time series (from sources such as: MQTT, Websockets, ZeroMQ, UDP, etc., supports data formats such as JSON, CBOR, BSON, Message Pack, etc.). It is a fast, powerful and intuitive cross-platform tool.
items.content_html:
Broker

  • NanoMQ (⭐2k) - A light-weight and Blazing-fast MQTT Broker for IoT Edge platform.

Clients

  • mqtt_monitor (⭐9) - simple and lightweight console moniotor for mqtt topics, with eye-candies, in python 3.

Smart Home Hardware Interfaces / Firmwares for ESP based Devices

  • can2mqtt (⭐92) - CAN-Bus - MQTT Bridge (also works vice versa).
  • gardena2mqtt (⭐12) - Docker Gateway to control GARDENA Smart system devices (Sileno mower, Irrigation Control, etc.) through MQTT.
  • zwavejs2mqtt (⭐1.1k) - Zwave to Mqtt gateway and Control Panel Web UI.

Misc / Firmwares for ESP based Devices

  • serial2mqtt (⭐139) - A Linux gateway to connect low-cost microcontrollers only with a serial port to MQTT.

Visualization, Dashboards / Firmwares for ESP based Devices

  • MYHELLOIOT - MYHELLOIOT is a MQTT dashboard application inspired in my other MQTT project HelloIoT.
  • PlotJuggler (⭐5.2k) - PlotJuggler is a tool to visualize time series (from sources such as: MQTT, Websockets, ZeroMQ, UDP, etc., supports data formats such as JSON, CBOR, BSON, Message Pack, etc.). It is a fast, powerful and intuitive cross-platform tool.

items.title: Awesome Cybersecurity Blueteam
items.content_text:
### DevSecOps / Dependency confusion

*   [Dependency Combobulator (⭐93)](https://github.com/apiiro/combobulator) - Open source, modular and extensible framework to detect and prevent dependency confusion leakage and potential attacks.
*   [Confusion checker (⭐62)](https://github.com/sonatype-nexus-community/repo-diff) - Script to check if you have artifacts containing the same name between your repositories.
items.content_html:
DevSecOps / Dependency confusion

  • Dependency Combobulator (⭐93) - Open source, modular and extensible framework to detect and prevent dependency confusion leakage and potential attacks.
  • Confusion checker (⭐62) - Script to check if you have artifacts containing the same name between your repositories.

items.title: Awesome Jax
items.content_text: ### Libraries / New Libraries * [JaxDF (⭐128)](https://github.com/ucl-bug/jaxdf) - Framework for differentiable simulators with arbitrary discretizations.
items.content_html:
Libraries / New Libraries

  • JaxDF (⭐128) - Framework for differentiable simulators with arbitrary discretizations.

items.title: Urban and Regional Planning Resources
items.content_text:
### Platforms and Software Resources / Environmental and Climate Planning Tools and Platforms

*   [iTree](https://www.itreetools.org/) - Quantifies the benefits and values of trees around the world. Is based on peer-reviewed, USDA Forest Service Research.

### Platforms and Software Resources / Public Engagement Tools and Platforms

*   [bangthetable](https://www.bangthetable.com/) - Provides access to a platform that centralizes community engagement, making it easy to capture, analyze, and report on city-wide engagement through one single platform.
items.content_html:
Platforms and Software Resources / Environmental and Climate Planning Tools and Platforms

  • iTree - Quantifies the benefits and values of trees around the world. Is based on peer-reviewed, USDA Forest Service Research.

Platforms and Software Resources / Public Engagement Tools and Platforms

  • bangthetable - Provides access to a platform that centralizes community engagement, making it easy to capture, analyze, and report on city-wide engagement through one single platform.
